A

Account - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents the following bank account information:
Account number
Available balance
Name of the account holder
Total balance and available balance
ATM pin number of the account holder

ATM - module ATM
 
ATM - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents the following automatic teller machine (ATM) functionalities:
- Initiating the ATM screen for login
- Validating the login
- Validating the pin number
- Displaying the account related menu options and information.
ATM() - Constructor for class ATM
Initiates the ATM screen and instance for usage.
ATM.Backcheck - Class in Unnamed Package
Takes the user back to the main menu.
ATM.BCheck - Class in Unnamed Package
Checks what buttons were pressed on the key pad.
ATM.BClear - Class in Unnamed Package
Enables the user to clear the screen input.
ATM.Nextcheck - Class in Unnamed Package
Determines the iterator pattern to move forward on the screen.
ATM.Prevcheck - Class in Unnamed Package
Determines the iterator pattern to move back on the screen.
authenticateuser(int) - Method in class ATM
Authenticates the user by validating the pin number and create the menu.
